Date: 2019/12/06 16:33
Subject: Fwd: Defense private investigator/permission to visit mcc
Attachments: TEXTT.htm [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] certificate and license.pdf, Signed BOP visitation form.pdf, Mime.822

Please see the application previously sent along with credentials, attached to this email.
[b(6); (b)(7)(C)] Esq.
EPSTEIN SACHS PLLC
Office: 212.684 [b(6); (b)(7)(C)]
Mobile: 917.566 [b(6); (b)(7)(C)]

-------- Forwarded message --------
From: [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] @gmail.com>
Date: Thu, Dec 5, 2019 at 3:03 PM
Subject: Re: Defense private investigator/permission to visit mcc
To: [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] @bop.gov>
Cc: [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] @bop.gov>, [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] @bop.gov>, [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] @hotmail.com>
[b(6); (b)(7)(C)]

Attached please find the BOP visitation form and licensing credentials from the private investigator.
Please let me know what else you need from us. We recently received CJA permission for Mr. [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] to travel to NYC to visit our client with us at the MCC on Monday and Tuesday next week, so I appreciate your helping us to expedite this process.
Best,
[b(6); (b)(7)(C)] Esq.
EPSTEIN SACHS PLLC

Mobile: 917.566 [b(6); (b)(7)(C)]
